message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer but $22,000 is a bit out of my range. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering my budget and the product's value.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000? I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $18,000 is still out of my range. I'm willing to go up to $12,000, which is a fair price considering my budget and the product's value. I'm hoping we can reach an agreement soon.
